attributes.action: More choice for men and boys in clothing and shoes creating equality
attributes.additional_details: I recently spoke to someone in a shop about it, she said she works in the shops higher up department and said it's because they don't sell as much. Well put more choice etc and then they would sell more. Shoes are a great example say 10 different styles of boys shoes to 20 different styles of girls shoes if everything is about equality shouldn't this also.
attributes.background: Ok I'm sure I'm not the only parent, etc who feels like the clothes industry is targeted towards females, it's so unfair that there are loads of girls and women's clothes, but only a handful of boys and men's clothes why should males be made to miss out.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.
